body_html: So... is the reason you have to hand-construct the PythonOp at tracing time, because if you actually made a PythonOp class, autograd would stop working? But isn't that still true if you try to run the traced thing?
body_text: So... is the reason you have to hand-construct the PythonOp at tracing time, because if you actually made a PythonOp class, autograd would stop working? But isn't that still true if you try to run the traced thing?
body: So... is the reason you have to hand-construct the PythonOp at tracing time, because if you actually made a PythonOp class, autograd would stop working? But isn't that still true if you try to run the traced thing?
